title: Yukashi Yuusha no Fukushuutan: Mizu wo Oyu ni suru Koto Shika Dekinai Yuusha dakedo, Subete wo Ubatta Omaera wo Korosu niwa Koitsu de Juubunda
altTitle: 湯沸かし勇者の復讐譚〜水をお湯にすることしか出来ない勇者だけど、全てを奪ったお前らを殺すにはこいつで十分だ〜
The Tale of the Teapot Hero's Revenge: Although a Hero Was Only Capable of Boiling Water, That Was Enough to Kill All of Those Who Stole Everything from Her
